mapper.select: SELECT r.* FROM jaguar_modules_system_user_role ur LEFT JOIN jaguar_modules_system_role r ON r.id_ = ur.role_id WHERE ur.deleted_ = 0 AND r.deleted_ = 0 AND r.role_enable = 1 AND ur.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_account, u.user_phone, u.user_email, u.user_nick_name FROM jaguar_modules_system_user_role ur LEFT JOIN jaguar_modules_system_user u ON u.id_ = ur.user_id WHERE ur.deleted_ = 0 AND u.deleted_ = 0 AND ur.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT DISTINCT menu_function_name FROM jaguar_modules_system_role_menu rm INNER JOIN jaguar_modules_system_role r ON r.id_ = rm.role_id INNER JOIN jaguar_modules_system_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id_ WHERE rm.deleted_ = 0 AND r.deleted_ = 0 AND ur.deleted_ = 0 AND r.role_enable = 1 AND ur.user_id = #{userId}
